Home.metaTitle: LibroFlow | Modern Library Management System Software
Home.metaDescription: Streamline your library operations with LibroFlow. Manage book cataloging, member circulation, and analytics in one powerful cloud-based platform.
Home.ogDescription: The all-in-one solution for modern libraries.

LandingPage.heroTitle: Modern Library Management for the Digital Age
LandingPage.heroSubtitle: Streamline cataloging, circulation, and member management with an intuitive interface designed for librarians.
LandingPage.featuresTitle: Everything You Need to Run Your Library
LandingPage.feature1Description: Instantly search, filter, and organize thousands of books with our powerful metadata engine.
LandingPage.feature2Description: Track memberships, overdue fines, and reading history in one unified dashboard.
LandingPage.feature3Description: Visualize borrowing trends and popular genres to make data-driven acquisition decisions.
